articles.title: Who is Istanbul Mayor Imamoglu who won big in Turkey local elections? - Al Jazeera English

articles.content: The opposition in Turkey has claimed a big victory over President Recep Tayyip Erdogan and his Justice and Development Party (AK Party) in local elections with the main opposition Republican Peoples … [+5793 chars]

articles.title: Not a joke: the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6 Ultra may be real - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com

articles.content:
We could get a cheaper Galaxy Z Fold6, or a Galaxy Z Fold6 Ultra, depending on the rumor of the day. Today, the rumor points to the latter.
